By logging in with Facebook, you can share your Wouafs on your wall and show your photos with Facebook.\nWouaf IT will never post on your wall without your consent.
Or connect with your Wouaf IT account
Post my Wouafs on my Facebook wall
Be notified by email of comments on your Wouafs
Be notified by email of comments on your comments

Publish on Wouaf IT demands respect of some simple rules:

 • You are responsible for your use of this service.

 • Your publications are public and visible to all.

 • Do not post offensive content or which can harm others (racism, defamation, pornography, etc.).

 • Do not impersonates any person or entity.

 • Do not post anything false, misleading or likely to mislead users.

 • Do not offer any service in disagreement with the laws of your country of publication.

 Wouaf IT reserves the right to remove any post not complying with these conditions.

 You can read the full terms and conditions of the service on the site http://wouaf.it/terms .
To publish on Wouaf IT, you must login first.
The defined position lacks of precision. Are you sure you did not want to zoom in a bit?

You must be logged in with a Facebook account to be able to add photos from your Facebook album ...
Post this Wouaf on my Facebook wall
Do you confirm the form reset?
Your text is too long: 300 characters maximum.
Your Wouaf is successfully published! ... Unfortunately, publication on Facebook failed.
Join me on Wouaf IT: the first micro-events network

Wouaf IT is the first micro-events network.

 Publish all kind of life events from your mobile.

 • You have lost your dog?
 • You want to buy a car?
 • You want to sell your couch?
 • You want to organize a hike?
 • You want to promote a party?
 • You want to share a good plan?
 • You want to carpool?
 • You want to know what to do this weekend?
 • You met a lost dog ...?

 Post your own events and ads and look around you interesting events from other Wouaffers.
 You do not ever wonder what to do with your weekends.

Post a Wouaf is very simple, follow the tips below:

 A Wouaf is an event. You can post all kinds of events in Wouaf IT.
 For example, if this is your first Wouaf, you can say that you just discover Wouaf IT!

 To publish well, here's a little help:

 • Write a message of 300 characters maximum. Be brief, but do not overuse abbreviations to stay clear.

 • In your message, you can transform words in "tags" by prefixing them with a hash (eg #dog). Thus it will be possible to find your Wouaf when searching on these tags.

 • Add a category from the list. Choose well and other Wouaffers will find your Wouaf more easily.

 • You must give a start date and a duration for your Wouaf. It will be visible only from this date and for the duration selected.

 • By default, your Wouaf will be located in your current position, but you can choose another location if you wish. Use the map to choose a new location.

 For Wouaffers who connect with their Facebook account:

 • You can add to your Wouaf up to 5 pictures from your Facebook public albums. Do not hesitate to illustrate your message!

 • You can automatically publish your Wouaf on your Facebook wall. Thus, all your Facebook contacts and friends will also be informed.

 Tips and additional warnings:

 • Before you publish your Wouaf, reread it well because you can not change it.
 In case of error you will need to delete it and then recreate it.

 • To prevent abuse, you can not post more than 10 Wouafs by days.

 • Beware of personal informations you publish (address, phone number, etc.). Wouaffers can always contact you via email with Wouaf IT.

 • Attention Wouaf IT does not guarantee financial transactions. To avoid unpleasant surprises, we recommend that you always hand deliver things.

 • Remember to respect the conditions of use of the service.

Wouaf IT © %1$s by Sébastien PAUCHET

 The mobile application Wouaf IT is distributed under an open source Apache license. Source code is available on Github: https://github.com/WouafIT

 This application would not have been possible without the assistance, listening, support and advice of ♥ Marie Luce ♥, Raphaël, @or3lie and Karl.

 Wouaf IT uses different tools to operate. Thank you to their authors and contributors:

 • Appcelerator Titanium: http://www.appcelerator.com
 • Figue library: http://code.google.com/p/figue
 • Bootstrap and twitter-text-js libraries: https://github.com/twitter
 • Iconsweets packs: http://yummygum.com
 • OSM and Mapquest Open Data Map: http://developer.mapquest.com/web/products/open
 • Some functions of php.js : http://phpjs.org

 Protection of personal data:

 Wouaf IT is and will be respectful of your personal data. They will not be sold or commercially exploited outside of the use required to operate the service.
 You can delete your profile at any time. Your data will be fully and immediately deleted as well. A few days are necessary for this deletion spreads to the backup service.

 Go on the website http://wouaf.it and on Twitter https://twitter.com/Wouaf_IT for more informations on Wouaf IT.

You have reached the limit of 10 Wouafs per days. You can not publish anymore today.
You must be logged in to view your favorites and Wouafs.
Wouaf IT is not related to Eventful. This information is provided for your convenience only. You can disable elements from Eventful in the application settings.

The map screen is the most important in Wouaf IT. Well know it is important.
 Here's some info to help you!

 When you arrive on the map, it focuses on you: the blue dot in the middle is you.
 A search is automatically started to see Wouafs active around you today.
 A second search is also launched to see events from the site eventful.com around you.

 At the bottom of the screen, you will find five buttons.
 With the first 4, from left to right, you can:
Change the date and time of the search.
The fifth button on the right opens the advanced search.
Two other buttons are present at the top of the map. They are handy when you move the map:
On the left, a button to refresh the search from the current center of the map.
At right, a button to center the map on your location.
Voila, you know everything you need!\n\n Why not start by publishing that you just discover Wouaf IT?!
Press again to exit Wouaf IT

Hello %1$s,


You have a contact request from %5$s for your Wouaf :


%3$s


You can contact %5$s at: %4$s
To view the message, please use an HTML compatible email viewer!

Hello %1$s,


A new comment has been added to that Wouaf you asked to follow:


By %3$s:

%4$s

Hello %1$s,


You have requested to reset your password on Wouaf IT.

Here's your new password to log in:


%2$s

Caution, email is not a secure means of communication. We advise you to log in with this password and then change it in your account.

Hello %1$s,


You created your account on Wouaf IT, welcome!

To permanently activate your account, Please click the following link:


%2$s

Be careful, you must activate your account under 6h or it will be automatically deleted.
Missing user id or login or email.
Login must be at least 3 characters long and maximum 100 characters long.
Password must be at least 6 characters long and maximum 100 characters long.
Lastname must have maximum 100 characters long.
Firstname must have maximum 100 characters long.
Invalid gender, must be male or female.
Invalid date format, must be YYYY-MM-DD.
Login, password and email are mandatory for user creation.
Device Id must have maximum 100 characters long.
Missing Facebook Id or Facebook token.
Error during Facebook connection. Facebook user Id mismatch for this token.
Error during Facebook connection. Cannot validate authentification.
Error during Facebook connection. Cannot get user email.
Error when creating user from Facebook infos.
Missing bounding box parameter (bb) or location parameter (loc).
Cannot make query on bounding box (bb) and location (loc), please choose one.
Invalid bounding box query (bb). Should be "bottom left latitude,bottom left longitude,upper right latitude,upper right longitude".
The maxium publication for today is reached.
Text must have maximum 300 characters long.
Invalid category (cat). Should be a valid category id.
Invalid date. Should be a valid timestamp.
Invalid duration. Should be a valid integer lower than 1209600.
Invalid fbpost. Should be a valid boolean.
Invalid pics. Should be a valid JSON array.
Location, category, date and duration are mandatory for post creation.
Error when updating user post infos.
Invalid date and duration. The post has already passed.
Username must be at least 3 characters long and maximum 100 characters long.
Invalid date format, must be YYYYMMDD
Invalid language, must be fr_FR or en_US
Invalid signwname, must be a valid boolean
User does not want to be contacted
Cannot remove comment from another user
Invalid tag, should only be alphanumeric characters
Invalid contact, should be a valid boolean
Invalid notif, should be a valid boolean
Invalid pics, should be a valid JSON array
Cannot remove Wouaf from another user
